name: Brooklyn babe 66
text: I ordered a veggie pizza my toppings were placed on top not baked into the bread as normal and all the toppings kept falling off. I've had veggie pizza before and its always baked. All of the toppings were cold no heat. Also I ordered …More

name: Rebekkah Todd
text: We ordered late last night, they went above and beyond in substituting an item they had run out of. Thanks for the stellar service! Better than other pizza places nearby. We just received a picture perfect supreme pizza. Sticking with the experts.

name: Jodie White
text: Haven't had Pizza Hut in a while, so we decided to order from here although you don't deliver to me. I drove and picked up inside. Everyone had mask and Kaitlyn(I think that was her name) was very nice and very professional. The pizza was delicious the order was correct and hot! Thanka y'all have a new customer for sure.

name: Daniel Jones
text: This location has always been stingy with their sauces, but today is the final straw. I ordered my pizzas with extra sauce and still got them with almost no sauce at all. Papa John's is right in advertising better pizza, just too bad they're too far away to deliver.

name: Effie Cull
text: This time the pizza was cold no toppings  it was honestly horrible.

name: Dorothy Sangallo
text: It's a mile from our house, so we tried them.  The first was a delivery and they forgot us and had to remake our pizza.  The 2nd was a ham and pineapple that I decided to pick up and was disappointed again because they burnt it.  We may be done.

name: octokw
text: Great pizza but the price was not great.

name: terry cribb
text: First, this is nothing to do with the staff. They were respectful and friendly. The issue is with them not having wings on Wednesday which is the day they offer discounted wings. They make awesome wings compared most places I will say.  But …More

text: I have no idea what they are doing at this location and I am pretty sure they don’t know either.  I went to pick an online order up and when I walked in they had 7 other people waiting on food! After waiting 30 minutes in the store and …More

text: I use to order from here so much then I stopped for some months. So the last time I came here before today I ordered a pan pizza only for my pizza to be all bread and little pizza. I dont know how to add photos otherwise I'll add the …More

name: Justin Nifong
text: Pizza hut, was pretty good. About as you would expect from here. I prefer dusinas pizza and wings but it's pretty good for what it is. I will probably be back if it's late at night and I need a quick pizza.

name: Laura Mike Cloer
text: The pizza is very good, but the girl who took my order very the phone acted like she was annoyed that I called. "Yeah" and "Huh" are not professional responses nor is hanging up in the middle being asked a question.

name: Bryan Kelly
text: Normally pretty good but the last few times have taken much longer than I was told. The last time a few days ago when I got there the food wasn't ready but no big deal. Once the food was ready I was informed that they had forgotten to make …More

text: The last three times that we were there, they gave us someone else's orderand our pizza was over done twice.  Won't go back.  Pizza hut use to have fantastic pizza, not at this store.

name: Rocky Sasser
text: They were overwhelmed by a "game day order" today. Couldn't answer the phone to take an order. Was going to take 30 minutes or more to get a pizza when I drove down to place my order. Ended up getting one from next door. When I shared the …More

name: Darla P
text: This location has really gone down hill. Ordered a supreme with no onions and it was covered in onions. Got home called them back, they said to come get another one and the second one wasn't correct either. This location is 12 miles from my …More

name: Hayley Fulk
text: I have ordered from here off and on since this location opened. I have had mostly good experiences and when I have had bad ones this location is quick to resolve the issue when it is brought to their attention.

text: I wish I can give a 0 star but i can't. So I order a big box with wings and cheese bread.. It took an hour and 15 minutes.. No garlic crust that I order.. Cheese bread hard as brick uncut and burnt. The same with the 2 pizzas. Literally I …More

text: I ordered 2 regular pepperoni pizzas one with Italian sausage, the order was delivered and one of the pizzas was missing Italian sausage. I called to get the order fixed and after speaking to 3 people a manager finally got on the phone to …More

text: They have a new employee that doesn't understand what I say and when I asked for extra cheese or if I say I want half the pizza with one topping and other half of the pizza with 2 toppings is not an option for her so the last couple of pizzas we received we're just awful so I started trying Papa John's & Marcos.

text: Pizza is good. One personal pan pizza fed my 10 year old girl.

name: G Troutman
text: Most recent order of my usual Super Supreme specialty pizza contained about half the weight of toppings vs my last visit several weeks prior. All the toppings were there but were chopped and spread much thinner.  If I wanted a pizza that's pancake thin I'd simply drive a bit further to Dusina's in Welcome.
